generated_body: The article titled "Pompeo 'on shifting sand' as impeachment probe reveals his role in Ukraine pressure campaign" is likely to explore former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo's involvement in the Ukraine controversy linked to the impeachment proceedings against former President Donald Trump. The piece may also provide insights into how the ongoing investigation affects Pompeo's reputation and position within the Republican Party.
